name: @pattern-lab/starterkit-handlebars-demo
description: Pattern Lab's Demo StarterKit for Handlebars.
author: Brad Frost

scripts.build: copyfiles ../../node_modules/@fontsource/abel/files/*.woff* ../../node_modules/@fontsource/raleway/files/*400-*.woff* ../../node_modules/@fontsource/raleway/files/*700-normal.woff* dist/fonts -f && cd dist/css && sass style.scss:style.css pattern-scaffolding.scss:pattern-scaffolding.css --load-path=../../../../node_modules/
